title: Is 1984 becoming a reality in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: When you say 1984 I assume you are referring to the Macintosh ad about that year. Well it isn't massively becoming like that. You can look at this question from two different perspectives. Firstly, there was that brief fortnite drama after it was being banned from the app store for not paying an extraordinary amount of profit to apple. There is a lot of dictatorship currently, like NK and China, sort of Russia and Nepal. So in a way yes, but not in an apocalyptic way.
2020 is the worst year in the 21st century. 1984 is just a rather ordinary year. What do you want to compare these two years together?
